Tweak the values in below so that you can understand the their functionality and enjoy the visualzation
1. set_style :
parameters : style (whitegrid,darkgrid,white, dark,ticks)
             axis grid = (True, False)
2. figure :
parameters : dpi = length of the plot (change the value and see what is happening)

3. Scatterplot:
parameters : data = dataframe 
             x = any column (should be numerical)
             y = any column from the dataset given (numerical)
             hue = column with categories
             style = column with catergories and see the magic
